dream packing list

2006-06-20

  • bananas
  • ski boots
  • crampons
  • more bananas
  • clip board
  • maps
  • notes
  • poofy coat

I dreampt I was repacking my bag in a Roman temple.  Outside there were some massive cats made of black marble.  H was there, and we tangoed around for a bit.  If I go to Italy this summer, I don't think I'll need a poofy coat.

  • italy
